TITLE: Algas del Norte Spa.
CONTACT_US_2: Please fill the form if you want to contact us.
BEGIN: They date back more than 30 years, starting as a family-owned business and now standing out independently.
PLANT: It is located in La Serena, a location with excellent weather conditions, ideal for natural drying fields, which allows us to achieve optimal results for drying fresh seaweed. It features several dry cutting and baling lines, all of this to obtain the product's granularity and packaging according to customer requirements.
